Interaction SMVDU

Student and Faculty Interaction system for a College.

Inventory Control System

Software in Java to control the buying and Selling of inventories.

Personal Encyclopedia

Software to help maintain your data and notes and provide search option to manage your data in effective manner.

Monet

This application is designed using java. It helps in searching of local network for shared files.

Manga Downloader

Software to help download Manga from website like Kissmanga.com in single click.

CSS-Slide

CSS plugin to add style to the content of website.

AppShutdown

This application helps you in time your shutdown and restart. It also provide other features like hibernate, logoff and abort shutdown process.

Network Search

It helps in searching for shared files in the local network same as monet but faster with more functionalities.
